titles.title: Crisis Care Improvement and Suicide Prevention Act of 2020
Crisis Care Improvement and Suicide Prevention Act of 2020
Crisis Care Improvement and Suicide Prevention Act of 2020
A bill to amend the Community Mental Health Service Block Grant to authorize a set-aside for crisis care services, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care
